tokens.text: picks up blocks from the world (enderman-specific)

description: Allows the enderman to take a block and carry it around.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Enderman Take Block Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the enderman to take a block and carry it around. Can only be used by Endermen.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
